attributes.review: This app is literally the worst app i could ever download like who wants to know about a child predator cheeto mans plans??? i fainted because trump is so ugly and i can’t stand his app it’s so bad do not download

attributes.review: I got this app as a joke and then it immediately began stabbing me with its misogynistic , racist and fascist ideals. I was slowly dying and while I lay there a weird orange man visited me and began crying like a baby over the app tiktok. Very strange!!! DO NOT download!!!!

attributes.review: Like this app is is more unorganized than my parents marriage. If this had a taste it would taste worse than my families corn free corn bread. The app is at best stinky and smelly.
